amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to destroy any record of the national instant criminal background check system within 90 days after the record is created.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to destroy any record of the national instant criminal background check system within 90 days after the record is created.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 268 (Roll no. 244).
